glosses: A mischievous child. (this sense in modern Turkish is most contemporary, often in compounds, such as "şer çocuk")

examples.text: ... şer çocuk değildi , herkese kendini sevdirirdi . İçimiz- de en iyi yazanlardan biriydi , piyes yazardı , beni de bu yola teşvik ederdi . " ( a.g.e. s . 61 ) Ömer Seyfeddin , " Diyorlar ki " sahibine verdiği cevapta , edebiyatla ilgisini ...
examples.translation: He was not a naughty child, he made everyone love him. He was one of the best writers among us, he wrote plays, and he encouraged me to follow this path.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish شر, from Arabic شَرّ (šarr).
